title: Winnie the Pooh and Christmas too
brief_description: Christopher Robin and the other favourites in the Hundred Acre Wood are disappointed when they realise they have no way to get their Christmas wish list to Santa Claus. That’s when Winnie the Pooh decides to deliver the list himself and sets off on a quest to save Christmas. Also includes two other stories - “Tigger is the mother of invention” and “Magic Earmuffs”.
